meanings.definition: fastened or secured with a hasp
meanings.sent1: The hasped door kept the room safe.
meanings.sent2: The hasped lock was strong and reliable.
meanings.sent3: The hasped window seemed to wink at passersby.
meanings.sent4: His hasped heart was finally at peace.
meanings.sent5: The hasped gate stood as a guardian of the garden.

meanings.sent1: She hasped the chest to protect her treasures.
meanings.sent2: He hasped the suitcase shut before the journey.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel hasped the acorn in its tiny paws.
meanings.sent4: The memory hasped itself firmly in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The knight hasped his armor before the battle.
